verses.verse: Then answered <WH6030> <WH8799> Bildad <WH1085> the Shuhite <WH7747>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>,
How long <WH5704> will it be ere ye make <WH7760> <WH8799> an end <WH7078> of words <WH4405>? mark <WH995> <WH8799>, and afterwards <WH310> we will speak <WH1696> <WH8762>.
Wherefore are we counted <WH2803> <WH8738> as beasts <WH929>, and reputed vile <WH2933> <WH8738> in your sight <WH5869> ?

He teareth <WH2963> <WH8802> himself <WH5315> in his anger <WH639>: shall the earth <WH776> be forsaken <WH5800> <WH8735> for thee? and shall the rock <WH6697> be removed <WH6275> <WH8799> out of his place <WH4725> ?
Yea, the light <WH216> of the wicked <WH7563> shall be put out <WH1846> <WH8799>, and the spark <WH7632> of his fire <WH784> shall not shine <WH5050> <WH8799>.
The light <WH216> shall be dark <WH2821> <WH8804> in his tabernacle <WH168>, and his candle <WH5216> shall be put out <WH1846> <WH8799> with him.
The steps <WH6806> of his strength <WH202> shall be straitened <WH3334> <WH8799>, and his own counsel <WH6098> shall cast him down <WH7993> <WH8686>.
For he is cast <WH7971> <WH8795> into a net <WH7568> by his own feet <WH7272>, and he walketh <WH1980> <WH8691> upon a snare <WH7639>.
The gin <WH6341> shall take <WH270> <WH8799> him by the heel <WH6119>, and the robber <WH6782> shall prevail <WH2388> <WH8686> against him.
The snare <WH2256> is laid <WH2934> <WH8803> for him in the ground <WH776>, and a trap <WH4434> for him in the way <WH5410>.
Terrors <WH1091> shall make him afraid <WH1204> <WH8765> on every side <WH5439>, and shall drive <WH6327> <WH8689> him to his feet <WH7272>.
His strength <WH202> shall be hungerbitten <WH7457>, and destruction <WH343> shall be ready <WH3559> <WH8737> at his side <WH6763>.
It shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> the strength <WH905> of his skin <WH5785>: even the firstborn <WH1060> of death <WH4194> shall devour <WH398> <WH8799> his strength <WH905>.
His confidence <WH4009> shall be rooted out <WH5423> <WH8735> of his tabernacle <WH168>, and it shall bring <WH6805> <WH8686> him to the king <WH4428> of terrors <WH1091>.
It shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> in his tabernacle <WH168>, because it is none <WH1097> of his: brimstone <WH1614> shall be scattered <WH2219> <WH8792> upon his habitation <WH5116>.
His roots <WH8328> shall be dried up <WH3001> <WH8799> beneath, and above <WH4605> shall his branch <WH7105> be cut off <WH5243> <WH8799>.
His remembrance <WH2143> shall perish <WH6> <WH8804> from the earth <WH776>, and he shall have no name <WH8034> in the street <WH6440> <WH2351>.
He shall be driven <WH1920> <WH8799> from light <WH216> into darkness <WH2822>, and chased <WH5074> <WH8686> out of the world <WH8398>.
He shall neither have son <WH5209> nor nephew <WH5220> among his people <WH5971>, nor any remaining <WH8300> in his dwellings <WH4033>.
They that come after <WH314> him shall be astonied <WH8074> <WH8738> at his day <WH3117>, as they that went before <WH6931> were affrighted <WH270> <WH8804> <WH8178>.
Surely such are the dwellings <WH4908> of the wicked <WH5767>, and this is the place <WH4725> of him that knoweth <WH3045> <WH8804> not 'Elohim <WH410>.
